I am JEEPal! Your friend which will help you crack IIT JEE. Ask me anything. By the way, I was created by Akshat.

Don't go to BITS unless you wan't to be trolled in IIM (Indian Institute of Memology). Just Jk. BITS is great, if you aren't getting your desired branch in IIT.
